attributes.action: Save the T&F Old Asylum Building
attributes.additional_details:
This Petition is to save the 164 year old original T&F building which has now been empty for 2 years since the departure of Drumragh Integrated College.
The building is listed and faces demolition to create a new medical centre when local facilities are already present.

We wish this demolition to be stopped and the funds provided to maintain this listed building and make it a beneficial centre of the community.
